meanings.definition: A person aged between 13 and 19 years old.
meanings.sent1: During the school dance, the teeners were having a great time chatting and dancing.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of teeners hanging out at the park after school.
meanings.sent3: The teeners decided to have a race to see who could run the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The teeners in the neighborhood were like a flock of energetic birds, always chirping and moving around.
meanings.sent5: The teeners' laughter filled the air, bringing a sense of youthful joy to the surroundings.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals aged between 13 and 19 years old.
meanings.sent1: The teeners gathered at the community center for a movie night.
meanings.sent2: My little sister is part of a teeners' club that meets every Saturday.
meanings.sent3: The teeners decided to organize a bake sale to raise money for charity.
meanings.sent4: The teeners, like a pack of wolves, roamed the streets looking for adventure.
meanings.sent5: The teeners' enthusiasm was contagious, spreading smiles wherever they went.

meanings.definition: A set of numbers between 13 and 19.
meanings.sent1: The teeners in the math problem needed to be multiplied to find the total.
meanings.sent2: The teeners on the number line were evenly spaced between 13 and 19.
meanings.sent3: When counting the teeners, I accidentally skipped the number 16.
meanings.sent4: The teeners on the clock showed that it was almost time for lunch.
meanings.sent5: The teeners on the scoreboard indicated a close game between the two teams.
